rules.name: Firebase Email to Solana Wallet
rules.description: Convert Firebase email/password authentication to Solana Mobile Wallet Adapter authentication

target.description: Replace Firebase email/password UI and logic with a Solana wallet connection button and signature request.

behavioralNotes: Session persistence moves from Firebase servers to the device's wallet app
User identity changes from email address to wallet public key
Password recovery is replaced by wallet recovery phrase (handled by wallet app)
Multi-device sync requires user to connect wallet on each device
migrationSteps: Add crypto polyfills to app entry point
Update user identification from email to publicKey
Update any Firebase-specific security rules in backend

rules.name: Firebase Google OAuth to Solana Wallet
rules.description: Convert Firebase Google OAuth authentication to Solana Mobile Wallet Adapter authentication

target.description: Replace Firebase Google OAuth flow with Solana wallet connection.

behavioralNotes: Google profile data (name, email, photo) will no longer be available
User identity changes from Google account to wallet public key
OAuth token refresh is replaced by wallet connection state
migrationSteps: Replace Google Sign-In button with WalletConnectButton
Update user profile handling to use on-chain data or local storage
